import React from 'react' import {Modal, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { numberWithCommas } from '../utils/utils' const ModalKeranjang = ({showModal, handleClose, keranjangDetail}) => { if(keranjangDetail){ return (

{keranjangDetail.product.nama_barang}

Rp. {numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.product.harga)}

Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! ) }else{ return ( Kosong Kosong ) } } export default ModalKeranjang
